modmenu.descriptionTranslation.socksprox: Use SOCKS proxy to connect to Minecraft server.
text.autoconfig.SocksProxyClient.title: SocksProxyClient config
This option takes precedence over "Loopback through proxy"
This applies to connection to Minecraft server.
GAME: Use proxyHost and proxyPort from game parameters
CUSTOM: Use proxy host and port from this config
Use proxyHost and proxyPort from game parameters
This option does NOT override "Loopback through proxy"
